name: Cache.calculator
tagline: This humble app calculates the cache organization for a 1 level cache system
body:
### Welcome to cache calculator app.
This app takes as inputs the cache specifications (size, block size, sssociativity, memory address size) and returns the tag, index and block offset bits for the memory address.
The second part of the app calculates the miss rate for the given cache and a set of loops and actions.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
